runs.comm: length ball jags in a little towards Warner, defended towards extra cover
short of length and outside off, moved away a touch, worked towards midwicket by Warner
swings in this time, wanted to get it in the blockhole but that turns out to be a low full toss, punched towards mid-off
length ball is pushed from the crease towards mid-off for a single
full ball on the pads, whipped towards deep square leg for a single
full ball outside off, powerfully struck by Warner towards point, where Umar akmal moves quickly to his right to field
power from Warner, he jumps down the track and clubs that length ball to the long-on rope, bouncs on the boundary, putting the pressure on Hafeez straightaway
great reply from Hafeez, flat ball that spins away and beats Warner, just misses offstump as well
gets his front leg out of the way as he muscles that past point for four, action-packed over this
makes room and thumps it towards point once more, can't beat the fielder though
goes straight on after pitching on a bit short, Warner waits on the back foot and scythes that past cover for four, clean striking from Warner, who hasn't been at his best this series
slapped towards cover off the back foot, can't place it as well as he wanted
short of length and outside off, angling away, Watson looks to dab that towards point but is beaten
short of length and closer to off this time, defended towards point by Watson
length ball outside off is driven crisply by Watson, can't beat the fielder
on middle stump, whipped behind square leg by Watson
massive from Warner, a length ball and Warner gets hold of that one, muscles that one over long-on
moves across and looks for the midwicket swipe, mistimed, the ball rolls towards midwicket, single taken

Warner put the pressure on Hafeez by launching him for six, this time he puts gul under pressure with a boundary, not very convincing though, outside edge to third man, Warner looking to swing at everything here
short of length and just outside off, swung towards midwicket for two more, Warner in a hurry
short of length ball on off stump, tucked towards midwicket for a tight single
short ball on leg stump, Watson pulls that, not too much power on that, down towards deep backward square leg
back of a length and around off, defended from the crease by Watson

short from Gul, a terrific pull from Watson, gets plenty of power on it to send it towards the midwicket boundary, Umar Akmal trying to cut that off near the rope but it was too quick for him, even Dan Christian would have had a tough time stopping that
Warner looks to reverse-sweep, actually the switch hit, he misses and that slides down the leg side (for a right-hander)
pushed towards mid-on for a single this time
Ajmal drops it short, Watson pulls it towards midwicket

is there anything Ajmal can't do? first over of the game , with Warner on fire, Ajmal has him bowled, Warner's cameo is over, the regulation offspinner from Ajmal, drifts in and spins away to take out the off stump, Warner is distraught
sliding in, Hussey defends off the front foot, bat and onto pad
full ball is defended to the off side off the front foot
a touch short, just outside off, Warner waits on the back foot, guides it down to third man for a single
watchfully defended down the track by Hussey
back of a length ball coming in towards the pads, edged onto the pads by Hussey
short of length ball, steered towards backward point, Watson wants one, Hussey sends him back after seeing Umar Akmal make a diving stop
slightly fuller from Gul, driven towards cover by Hussey
ends the over with a bouncer, Hussey briefly contemplates the pull but then ducks under the short ball
short of length and well outside off, slapped towards backward point
on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
just outside off, supremely played by Watson, gets on the back foot and guides that past point for four, waited for that one
length ball on middle and off, careful defence off the front foot
fuller and outside off, more defence from Watson
driven back towards the bowler, Australia losing momentum here
massive from Hussey, Warner started by smashing Hafeez's first ball for six, Hussey does the same, but this time he hits it even longer, much longer, on to the second tier beyond long-on
watchful defence from Hussey
gets on the back foot and tucks it to square leg
Watson goes deep in the crease, setting himself up for that ultra-effective swipe to midwicket, too short for that this time, pushed back to the bowler
this time he works it towards mid-on, Watson has to dive to make his ground at the non-striker's end
flat length ball heading for off stump, worked to midwicket for a single, that was tight, a direct hit and the third umpire would have had some work to do
on the pads, down to short fine leg for a quick single

Watson getting into the act now, he has been looking for the big hit for a while now, he reached out for it and absolutely muscles that for a straight six, when Watson hits them, boundary lengths don't matter
a full ball outside off, outside edge to third man for another tight single
pushed towards cover for a single
sweep from Watson, a thick inside-edge goes towards fine leg
a length ball from Tanvir, Watson goes downtown, doesn't hit it as powerfully as his previous six, this time Umar Akmal was interested at long-on, but that had enough to clear that fielder
waits on the back foot and guides it towards third man, a diving stop from Saeed Ajmal
just outside off, guided towards third man, and Ajmal has to field once more
on the pads, whipped towards short fine for one more
short of length ball from round the wicket, punched towards sweeper cover

full and wide, Hussey is an amazing batsman, he could barely reach that one but he still manages to deftly place it wide of the deep square leg fielder to pick up a boundary, 15 off the over, Australia keeping pace, but Ajmal has three to go
starts with a length ball just outside off, Watson goes well back and defends that watchfully

Ajmal is a magician, no doubt about it, now he gets Watson lbw, Watson went to sweep that one, he misses and the turning ball strikes his pads, a massive appeal, the umpire thinks about it and then raises the finger, that ball tuned a lot, Ajmal has plenty to say to Watson as the batsman walks off
another big appeal, White looking to sweep, but this time he is struck outside off
punched off the back foot towards deep extra cover

White looking to push that offspinner to the off side, huge lbw appeal, hit him just outside the line though the umpire didn't signal leg-byes, so he thinks there was an inside-edge, there wasn't but the line would have saved White
towards point, and Ajmal's second over is done
flighted on middle stump, paddled for a couple

a run-out, a direct hit from Umar Akmal, Australia lose one more, pushed that towards backward point and White wanted one, took a few paces down the track, there was no run in that as White belatedly realises, he looks to hasten back, by then Umar Akmal has fired in a throw that catches White short, two wickets in two overs for Pakistan, the crowd is loving it, Pakistan's fielding coach looking pleased as well
spins away sharply, and the birthday boy can't get bat on it

could have been another wicket there, Bailey went for the sweep, which seems to be Australia's tactic against spin, that was a top edge which looped in the air but didn't go all the way to deep backward square leg
punched towards long-on for a single
way outside off stump, it was flat and quick, Bailey looked to cut that but missed
Hafeez from round the wicket, reverse-swept fine by Hussey
on the pads, worked to backward square leg for a quick single
length ball sliding on, worked towards midwicket for one more
on the pads, spinning in, helped along to deep square leg
defended back towards the bowler
clipped off the back foot towards midwicket for one more
worked off the back foot towards wide mid-on
full and wide, muscled towards wide long-on, deep midwicket does the fielding
looks for the cut, that's the third time in his short innings that Bailey has missed the stroke
this time Bailey gets hold of it, a length ball is deposited over long-on for a big six, powerfully struck
spinning away after pitching on a length outside off, again Bailey misses the cut
goes for the reverse-sweep this time and connects well, that goes through short third man's legs, it is Ajmal who made the mistake, first mistake of the day
worked to sweeper cover for a single
too short from Ajmal, swept to deep backward square leg
spinning away from a length, pushed towards cover, good stop from Hafeez at short cover
quicker one from Ajmal, bounces extra, tapped towards square leg by Hussey
turns in sharply, a touch short from Ajmal, lot of bounce there, Bailey nudges that towards square leg
Hussey waits on the back foot and pushes the ball to sweeper cover, an over from Ajmal without a wicket, believe it

Gul gets the big wicket, Michael Hussey is gone, the crowd is going berserk, it was shortish from Gul, Hussey looked to pull that but can't connect properly, that loops towards long-on, easy catch there, difficult for Australia now
shortish once more, looks to pull that powerfully, mistimes it towards mid-on
a full ball slanting into the pads, David Hussey is a terrific T20 player, he gets going with a whip behind square leg
short ball outside off, powerfully pulled by Bailey, an authoritative hit from him
short of length and outside off, guided towards short third man
short of length ball, pushed towards cover for a single, Bailey retains strike
Tanvir starts with a short of length ball from round the wicket, towards point for a single

Tanvir has struck, bowling from well wide of the crease once more, angling in and Hussey swipes at it, he misses and that knocks back off stump, they are going to watch for the no-ball, there's no problem there, and Australia in deep trouble now
Tanvir over the wicket, full and wide, pushed towards cover for a single
Bailey looking good here, slams that towards deep square leg for a single
full ball heading for off stump, punched back past the bowler, will they come back for the second, no they don't have the time
worked behind square leg for a single
slams the first towards long-on, just a single
sliding on towards off stump, slapped towards backward point for a single
goes for the reverse-sweep, gets it towards point to get a single
quicker from Ajmal, on middle and off, poked behind point for a single
beaten outside off, that one bounces more than Bailey expects and doesn't turn in either
Bailey finishes off Ajmal's spell with a muscular hit for six, superb hit that from the Australian captain, and a much-needed one too, that was too short from Ajmal, a doosra which Bailey read
starts with a yorker, driven towards long-off for a single
Gul looking to hit the base of off stump, an inside-edge, a thick one sends it past short fine leg for four, 16 off 10 needed now, Bailey playing a gem here
poor from Gul, that was a knee-high full toss from Gul, Bailey sends that past short fine leg for four more, Australia surely ahead now

ooh, another time when the batsman could have been dismissed twice, a shortish ball is hammered back by Bailey, Gul stretches out his right hand but can't hang on to that one, then there's even more disappointment for him as he sees the ball just loop over the stumps at the non-striker's end

insanity! direct hit from third man, this is certainly not the Pakistan team we all expect, Matthew Wade is gone, brilliance from the substitute fielder Arafat, a yorker from Gul just outside off, squeezed down to third man, Wade wanted the second, but he was well out when that throw crashed into the stumps
length ball outside off, Christian is beaten, there is an appeal for a caught-behind

Razzaq strikes first ball, the birthday boy can't finish it, a slower short ball outside off, Bailey goes for the pull, a top edge and that sails towards midwicket, the substitute Arafat is everywhere, he takes the catch, Australia's bowlers will have to do the job with the bat now, you wouldn't believe the noise levels in Dubai
a full toss is whipped towards midwivcket for a single
a slower full ball on middle and leg, once again it is Arafat who fields after Cummins sweeps to deep square leg
short ball heading for the helmet, Christian can only get a single as he pulls it towards midwicket, that put plenty on pressure on young Cummins, who was nerveless on Test debut with the bat

oh my! he is nerveless with the bat here as well, a massive hit , a short of length ball heading down leg stump, that is a monster hit from Cukmmins that sends it over the wide long-on boundary, the scores are level, Australia coach Mickey Arthur loves that shot

it's a Superover, it wasn't the best final ball form Razzaq but it was good enough, a full toss on the pads, Cummins was looking to work that to the leg side, a leading edge that ballons towards mid-off, Imran Nazir and Umar Akmal both went for it, Nazir called for it, Umar backed away, Nazir takes it, Cummins wrings his hands in disappointment, this has been some game
